Lab.Description: The Cascading Style Sheets Level 3 standard, commonly known as CSS3, is a vast improvement over the previous version of the standard. Internet Explorer 10 is more standards-compliant than ever and supports most of the CSS3 specifications. This lab will present Internet Explorer 10’s support for a selection of features. In particular, this lab focuses on fonts, column layout, and a few advanced selectors and visual effects.
Lab.Title: New CSS3 Features
